zh.cpu_title_name_tip1: 1. 计算资源是EOS网络中的资源，获取时需要抵押委托的EOS.
zh.cpu_title_name_tip2: 2. EOS的抵押可以撤销，撤销后将于72小时候退回之您的账户.

en.cpu_title_name_tip1: 1. You have to delegate your EOS in case to acquire the resources.
en.cpu_title_name_tip2: 2. You could cancel the delegation anytime you want, but the amount will be returned in 72 hours.
